attributes.action: Grant Asylum to Medhi Kazemi an Iranian teenager threatened with execution due to his sexuality
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A life or death decision - Home News, UK - Independent.co.uk
http://www.independent.co.uk/n...
Mehdi Kazemi is a gay teenager from Iran. He sought sanctuary in Britain after his boyfriend was hanged for homosexuality. So why is Britain so determined to send him back to Tehran – to almost certain execution?

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
